// client/src/App.js import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import './../css/LoginRegister.css'; export default function App() { return (

Welcome to CryptoBank

Key Features

  • Secure, role-based access for Admins and Regular users
  • Multi-wallet support with real-time balances
  • Full transaction history: deposits, withdrawals, buys, and sells
  • Admin tools for customer profiles and linked wallet management

Get Started

  • Create a new account or log in to get going
  • Admins: add users, wallets, and review all transactions
  • Users: explore and manage your personal cryptocurrency wallets
); }
